---
title: spring-boot-redis2
tags: spring-boot
---

spring-boot 中redis加连接池与不加连接池的对比

```yml
redis:
    host: 127.0.0.1
    port: 6379
    pool:
      max-active: 50
      max-wait: -1
      max-idle: 30
      min-idle: 10
```
1.没有连接池
```
查询个人信息	
49661	7369	5607	12251	15276	22977	3	55819	0.006040957693159622	40.206127141422975	28.618696318948555	7.922400836480699
总体	        
49661	7369	5607	12251	15276	22977	3	55819	0.006040957693159622	40.206127141422975	28.618696318948555	7.922400836480699

```
2.有连接池
```
查询个人信息	
18529	2239	2074	3517	4155	5600	17	10045	0.0260132764855092	120.72740066980283	90.50167842663117	23.310681386338757
总体			
18529	2239	2074	3517	4155	5600	17	10045	0.0260132764855092	120.72740066980283	90.50167842663117	23.310681386338757

```
